page.title: 19"My Family's Old Cars"
page.content: My Dad's car is maroon. It is a Triumph Dolomite Sprint. It takes Â£2 worth of petrol to get to "town" (St. Austell). It's very neat and tidy inside and it takes four star petrol. The side and back windows are tinted blue. We have another car. It is a Mini Traveller. There is a little back place where Prince my dog, and I sit. The Dolomite has six headlights, three each side. We put the six headlights on when no cars are coming. If we put them on when other cars are coming it could cause an accident. Our drive is really bumpy so I like riding down it. Down at number eight there is a car and it's always going wrong. My Dad has to fix it. { {written by Joanna Taylor {girl aged 10}
